lines.text: El Cuelebere: A meal willingly enters Cuélebres cave? Who might you be?
Beatriz: My name is Beatriz and I have traveled far and wide to meet the magnificent Cuélebre himself.
El Cuelebere: I’m flattered, but if you have nothing more to offer than pretty words I’m afraid your journey ends here.
Beatriz: Hold on! I also wish to offer you my services. I’m a notorious thief from Sevilla and I can steal any treasure you want for your already very impressive hoard.

El Cuelebere: A tempting offer, maybe dinner can wait. If you can steal from La Xana’s treasure hoard from the bottom of Xibu lake I might let you live another day. Should be an easy task for a master thief such as yourself.
